item.title: VP2S
item.description: Introduction One of my old dreams was about having personal server which is accessible over Internet. So I could rent a VPS (Virtual Private Server). But, It’s Expensive Expensive (again!) Not that private So I build my own infrastructure based on old G41M motherboard. Here is what I did. Functional View Using Ubuntu-16.04 and Docker, I could have multiple services. nginx-proxy helped to map each service to dedicated sub-domain.
